verses.verse: Now <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H559>decided<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and a <S%H4438>royal<s%> <S%H1004>palace<s%> for himself.

So <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5608>assigned<s%> 70000 <S%H376>men<s%> to <S%H5449>carry<s%> <S%H5449>loads,<s%> and 80000 <S%H376>men<s%> to <S%H2672>quarry<s%> [stone] in the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and 3600 to <S%H5329>supervise<s%> them.

Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> [word] to <S%H2361>Huram<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "As you <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with <S%H1732>David<s%> my father, and <S%H1>sent<s%> him <S%H7971>cedars<s%> to <S%H730>build<s%> him a <S%H1129>house<s%> to <S%H1004>dwell<s%> in, so do for me.

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am about to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H6942>dedicating<s%> it to Him, to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H5561>fragrant<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Him, and [to set out] the <S%H4635>showbread<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> and to offer <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H6153>evening,<s%> on <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> and on <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moons<s%> and on the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>feasts<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> [being required] <S%H5769>forever<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"And the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am about to <S%H1129>build<s%> [will be] <S%H1419>great;<s%> for <S%H1419>greater<s%> is our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H430>gods.<s%>

"But <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H6113>able<s%> <S%H3581><s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for Him, for the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H8064>highest<s%> <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3557>contain<s%> Him? So <S%H4310>who<s%> am I, that I should <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for Him, <S%H3588>except<s%> <S%H518><s%> to <S%H6999>burn<s%> [incense] <S%H6440>before<s%> Him?

"And <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> me a <S%H2450>skilled<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> in <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H5178>brass<s%> and <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and in <S%H710>purple,<s%> <S%H3758>crimson<s%> and <S%H8504>violet<s%> [fabrics,] and who <S%H3045>knows<s%> how to <S%H9466>make<s%> <S%H6603>engravings,<s%> to [work] with the <S%H2450>skilled<s%> <S%H2450>men<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H5973>have<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my father <S%H1>provided.<s%>

<S%H7971>"Send<s%> me also <S%H730>cedar,<s%> <S%H1265>cypress<s%> and <S%H418>algum<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> from <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> for I <S%H3045>know<s%> that your <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> how to <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon;<s%> and <S%H2009>indeed,<s%> my <S%H5650>servants<s%> [will work] with your <S%H5650>servants,<s%>

to <S%H3559>prepare<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%> for me, for the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am about to <S%H1129>build<s%> [will be] <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H6381>wonderful.<s%>

"Now <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> to your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> the <S%H2404>woodsmen<s%> who <S%H3772>cut<s%> the <S%H6086>timber,<s%> 20000 <S%H3734>kors<s%> of <S%H4347>crushed<s%> <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> and 20000 <S%H3734>kors<s%> of <S%H8184>barley,<s%> and 20000 <S%H1324>baths<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> and 20000 <S%H1324>baths<s%> of <S%H8081>oil.<s%>"

Then <S%H2361>Huram,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> in a <S%H3791>letter<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon:<s%> "Because the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> His <S%H5971>people,<s%> He has <S%H5414>made<s%> you <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them."

Then <S%H2361>Huram<s%> <S%H559>continued,<s%> <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3045>endowed<s%> with <S%H7922>discretion<s%> and <S%H998>understanding,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> will <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and a <S%H4438>royal<s%> <S%H1004>palace<s%> for himself.

the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H1323>Danite<s%> <S%H1835><s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> and a <S%H6876>Tyrian<s%> father, who <S%H1>knows<s%> how to <S%H3045>work<s%> in <S%H6213>gold,<s%> <S%H2091>silver,<s%> <S%H3701>bronze,<s%> <S%H5178>iron,<s%> <S%H1270>stone<s%> and <S%H68>wood,<s%> [and] in <S%H6086>purple,<s%> <S%H713>violet,<s%> <S%H8504>linen<s%> and <S%H948>crimson<s%> fabrics, and [who knows how] to <S%H3758>make<s%> <S%H9466>all<s%> kinds of <S%H3605>engravings<s%> and to <S%H9466>execute<s%> <S%H2803>any<s%> <S%H3605>design<s%> <S%H4284>which<s%> may be <S%H834>assigned<s%> to him, [to work] with your <S%H5414>skilled<s%> <S%H2450>men,<s%> and with <S%H2450>those<s%> of my <S%H2450>lord<s%> <S%H113>David<s%> your father.

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> then, let my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and <S%H8184>barley,<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> and <S%H3196>wine,<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H559>spoken.<s%>

"And we will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> you <S%H6878>need<s%> from <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> it to you on <S%H7513>rafts<s%> by <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3305>Joppa,<s%> so that you may <S%H5927>carry<s%> it up to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>"

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5608>numbered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1616>aliens<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H5610>census<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> his father <S%H1>David<s%> had <S%H1732>taken;<s%> and 153600 were <S%H5608>found.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>appointed<s%> 70000 of them to <S%H5449>carry<s%> <S%H5449>loads,<s%> and 80000 to <S%H2672>quarry<s%> [stones] in the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and 3600 <S%H5329>supervisors<s%> to make the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5647>work.<s%>
